pages.text: $(thing)Alloys$() are made by combining two materials in an $(l:machines/processors#alloy_furnace)Alloy Furnace$(/l), inside which dust or ingots can be used to make the alloys. OreDict substitutions are valid.
Three $(item)Copper$() and one $(item)Tin$() make four $(item)Bronze$(). $(br2)$(o)This recipe is disabled if Thermal Foundation is installed$().
One $(item)Lithium$() and one $(item)Ferroboron Alloy$() make two $(item)Tough Alloy$().
One $(item)Diamond$() and two $(item)Graphite$() make two $(item)Hard Carbon Alloy$().

pages.title: Magnesium Diboride Alloy
pages.text: Two $(item)Boron$() and one $(item)Magnesium$() make three $(item)Magnesium Diboride Alloy$().

pages.title: Lithium Manganese Dioxide Alloy
pages.text: One $(item)Manganese Dioxide$() and one $(item)Lithium$() make two $(item)Lithium Manganese Dioxide Alloy$().
One $(item)Iron$() and two $(item)Coal$() or $(item)Graphite$() make one $(item)Steel$().$(br2)$(o)This recipe is disabled if Thermal Foundation is installed$().
One $(item)Steel$() and one $(item)Boron$() make two $(item)Ferroboron Alloy$().
Three $(item)Copper$() and one $(item)Silver$() make four $(item)Shibuichi Alloy$().
Three $(item)Tin$() and one $(item)Silver$() make four $(item)Tin Silver Alloy$().
Three $(item)Lead$() and one $(item)Platinum$() make four $(item)SOMETHING SOMETHING PLS FIX$() $(br1)$(o)This recipe is disabled if Thermal Foundation is installed$().
One $(item)Tough Alloy$() and one $(item)Hard Carbon Alloy$() make two $(item)Extreme Alloy$().

pages.title: Thermoconducting Alloy
pages.text: One $(item)Extreme Alloy$() and one $(item)Boron Arsenide$() make two $(item)Thermoconducting Alloy$().
One $(item)Silicon$() and one $(item)Graphite$() make two $(item)Silicon Carbide$().
15 $(item)Iron$() and one $(item)Carbon Manganese Blend$() make 16 $(item)HSLA Steel().
